word: H3648 - כָּמַר - kâmar - kaw-mar' - Be black

sections.paragraph: to yearn, to be kindled, to be black (hot), to grow warm and tender, to be hot or to grow hot, to become hot, to become emotionally agitated (Niphal)

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; properly to intertwine or contract, that is, (by implication) to shrivel (as with heat); figuratively to be deeply affected with passion (love or pity): - be black, be kindled, yearn.
